Articles.Content: As far as I know the part price specified in its cfg file is for wet mass. This causes all sorts of problems like parts with negative price and makes balancing resource costs extremely tedious. Changing the cost 1 unit of liquid fuel will affect the price of all fuel tanks. So, why not change the part cost in cfg file to be for dry mass instead?
At this point, it is too late to make that change

As far as I know the part price specified in its cfg file is for wet mass. This causes all sorts of problems like parts with negative price <snip>
